definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: It just so happened that this wise little quail was the Bodhisatta the Enlightenment Being.
sentences.chinese: 原来，这只聪明的鹌鹑是位菩萨转生。

sentences.english: After his death from old age, he was reborn in Sheogh as an Incubus.
sentences.chinese: 当他年老死后，他转生为谢尔戈的一个夜魔。

sentences.english: You have come here voluntarily to this blue green jewel and you have incarnated into the physical tenacities of flesh.
sentences.chinese: 们原本是自愿者来到这蓝绿星球，转生物理的。

sentences.english: Can destroy the body, and soul can reincarnate or transition.
sentences.chinese: 肉体可灭，而灵魂可以转生或转型。

sentences.english: If after you died, you could be reincarnated as any color dragon, which would you choose?
sentences.chinese: 如果你死后可以转生为龙，你选择哪种颜色的龙？

sentences.english: Metempsychosis , he said, is what the ancient Greeks called it.
sentences.chinese: “转生，”他说，是古希腊人的说法。

definition: the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
blood sacrifice/animal sacrifice (to a God or ancestral spirit)
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
to be reborn/to recover/to come back to life/to regenerate
reborn (of departed spirit)/to be reincarnated/to leave home for a new life
